label: Clear Error
tooltip: reset the pH and Orp pumps overtime error flags in order to let the regulation loops continue. "Mode", "PhPID" and "OrpPID" commands need to be switched back On after an error flag was raised

label: Restart
tooltip: reboot the controller (after 8 seconds from calling this command)

label: Refresh
tooltip: Request values refresh

label: Filtration Start Min
tooltip: set the earliest hour to run filtration pump

label: Filtration End  Max
tooltip: set the latest hour to run filtration pump

label: Filtration Pump
tooltip: This will manually turn the Filtration Pump ON or OFF

label: pH Pump
tooltip: This will manually turn the pHPump ON or OFF

label: Chl Pump
tooltip: This will manually turn the Chl Pump ON or OFF

label: Projecteur
tooltip: Turn projector ON/OFF

label: Auto Mode
tooltip: In Auto, filtration starts/stops at set times of the day

label: PhPID
tooltip: start/stop the Ph PID regulation loop

label: OrpPID
tooltip: start/stop the Orp PID regulation loop

label: Robot Pump
tooltip: start/stop the regulation of the pool water temperature

label: Relay R6
tooltip: Turn Relay6 ON/OFF

label: Winter Mode
tooltip: Activate Winter Mode

label: Max Uptime pH/Chl
tooltip: set the Max Uptime (in min) for the Ph and Chl pumps over a 24h period. If over, PID regulation is stopped and a warning flag is raised

label: Delay PID
tooltip: Delay (in mins) after FiltT0 before the PID regulation loops will start. This is to let the Orp and pH readings stabilize first. Should not be > 59mins

label: WPr High
tooltip: Set the water high-pressure threshold. When water pressure is over that threshold, an error flag is set.

label: WTemp Low
tooltip: Set the water low-temperature threshold below which there is no need to regulate Orp and Ph (ie. in winter) and filtration is only 2 hours. Above this threshold, filtration duration is 1/3rd of water temperature

label: MQTT Publish Interval (s)
tooltip: set the periodicity (in seconds) at which the system info (pumps states, tank levels states, measured values, etc) will be published to the MQTT broker

label: ph Pump (L/h)
tooltip: set pH pump flow rate un L/h

label: Chl Pump (L/h)
tooltip: set Chl pump flow rate un L/h

label: WPr Low
tooltip: Set the water low-pressure threshold. When water pressure is below that threshold, an error flag is set and filtration stops..

label: PID WSize
tooltip: PID window size

label: WTemp High
tooltip: Set the water high-temperature threshold over which filtration duration is 1/2 of the water temperature

label: Water Temp. Setpoint
tooltip: set the water temperature setpoint

topic: Check Chl and/or pH+ Tank Level!
name: Check Chl and/or pH+ Tank Level!
